text:
@senatemajldr @JudyWoodruff @NewsHour You have got to be the most inept, incompetent individual Congress has heard of... Why are you and the @GOP heading out for the weekend? Why do you get three day weekends every week while Millions of Americans are about to be hurting on your dime? 

https://t.co/fXMyl6c4Zm
